website_summaries.verdict: Use this formula to attain extreme volume for hair of all types and textures.
pros: Achieve shiny, high volume results in a few pumps
cons: Creates immediate results, but not proven for long-lasting effects

customer_reviews.title: Defective Spray Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it about 4 to 5 months ago as a backup supply (I do so with all my beauty products so I don't run out) and unfortunately, when I finally tried to use it, the spray nozzle will not work. Of course, Pharmapacks (seller) refuses to do anything about it since it was over 30 days. I write this review so no one else gets victimized and to make sure you check your spray nozzle right away.
customer_reviews.author: gariam

customer_reviews.title: Great volume without the weight and not greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Like that it’s an aerosol spray and feels lightweight. I have oily straight fine hair and this adds volume. I spray on damp hair and let it air dry and then sleep with my hair in a top knot and in the morning I have super volume. It doesn’t make my hair greasy either which is a huge must for me and it Also helps with frizz. I’m sure it’d provide even more volume if I blow dry. Definitely buying this again. I like it better then my bumble and bumble thickening spray.
customer_reviews.author: 57 Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying It's a 10 volumizing spray for at least 2 years. I like to buy it on Amazon because it is so much cheaper than buying it at the salon or Ulta. However, the last time I ordered it from Amazon (I am just now using the can I ordered), the product is not the same as it used to be. The spray nozzle is different, and the wonderful smell that this product had is no longer there. Even the effectiveness of the product is not the same. I hate to be skeptical, but I am wondering if this product is a type of "knock off." I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it. It made my hair feel grimy and was more flat than before. I was unable to return it because it's flammable so I gave it to my friend who recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: It does add volumne, but...
customer_reviews.text: It does volumize but I just don't like the way my hair feels when I use it. It makes my hair feel dirty and I end up washing it the next day after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Non

customer_reviews.title: They have what I need at the best price
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair that needs a lot of help to add volume. This is the best product for me and I love it! This product along w/ a bit of hairspray are the only things I need to achieve the style I prefer for days. Finding this product in my area that isn’t overly priced is a challenge. I will continue to purchase this product from this seller because it is cheaper and more convenient. Before ordering from this seller, I was driving all over town trying to find this product at a cheaper price. Ordering from this seller is win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Finally Home

customer_reviews.title: You can go big and go home ! love
customer_reviews.text: love the smell. My hairstylist got me hooked on its a 10 products when she introduced them onto my hair about 3 years ago. this one is new for me. i have thin dyed hair. so its hard for it to get big and bouncey. She gets my hair to lift about an inch without teasing just by using this product.
customer_reviews.author: jdmjunkie84

customer_reviews.title: spray nozzle malfunction/nonreturnable!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product many times and have never had a problem until ordering through pharmapacks. The bottle's spray nozzle malfunctioned after I had used for a few times but according the the seller's very restrictive return policy, I could not return or exchange. I will not purchase from them again...
customer_reviews.author: elene

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the first ingredient is alcohol which this particular alcohol is not good for your hair. It will dry it out. also there’s no return so it’s a total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell, sticky, useless liquid
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand very much but this particular product is useless and overpriced. I suspect that it is just ordinary hairspray with a manual pump dispenser. It has overly strong perfume smell. It did not ‘volumize’ my hair. I won’t use it again and I am very unhappy to have parted with $18 for a small bottle of sticky hairspray.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S. in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Gives volume but smells like bug spray.
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to receiving this after reading the reviews. I did get volume plus an unexpected horrible fragrance. Smelled to me like bug spray to me. Too overpowering! Will be trying something less smelly.
customer_reviews.author: sherylita

customer_reviews.title: I love how my hair feels so much thicker with more ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how my hair feels so much thicker with more body when I use It's a 10 Haircare Miracle Blowdry Volumizer. I spray it on damp hair at roots and let it air dry. I don't use a blow drier. Then I use my medium and big hair rollers, spraying water at the roots, then leave the rollers in for a couple of hours. When I let it down, it's thick, soft and so smooth and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use spray that doesn’t go everywhere
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser used this on my hair and I was surprised how well it worked. It is for the roots, not the whole strand of hair. This makes the spray imperative because products that you put on your hands to work through your hair gets on the ends as well.
customer_reviews.author: LindyBugs

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad i purchased this item. I have used several volumizing products with less than expected results. This makes my thinning hair appear fuller without stiffness. I found that using less is more with this product. Not a bad price. Worth trying if you need volume.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this stuff was legit...I have used it's a 10 products,but this stuff was terrible and made my hair feel dry flat and tangled.I tried it a couple more times before pitching it in the garbage. It also did not smell like its a 10 products.will never purchase this on here again
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Description sounded very promising ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving one star since I never got to use this product. It was delayed in shipping and I needed it before leaving on a trip. I have extra fine hair so am always looking for the perfect volumizer.
customer_reviews.author: PattyK

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Thinking this is a cheap knockoff. Makes my hair oily. No fragrance like the original product I’ve been using.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I may have had my expectations set too high. I had really been wanting to try this product. It isn’t terrible but I was not overly impressed. The volume was not earth shattering and not long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Burton

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a very long time; this is the first time buying on Amazon because I could not find locally. Very dissappointed with product I received. I don't know if the formulation was changed but it definitely is not the product I loved before. Does not provide volume and makes my hair feel oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for fine, straight hair
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with my flat iron and it helps the curl hold all day. It gives body and hold better than other products like it. I wish it wasn't so strong in alcohol, it lands on every surface and if it gets in your eyes, it burns. That said, I'll keep buying it as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: Great volumizer!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product to add volume to my hair. Works well when used as instructed. It took me a few times before I found the right amount to use and where to best apply through my hair. Now I’m very pleased with results. Also have used as a finish spray and I’m quite pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t weigh hair down and isn’t sticky
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this product smells and it really does make my hair feel like there’s more volume. This is the second time I’ve purchased this product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: I Am Mom

customer_reviews.title: Flat hair 🙁
customer_reviews.text: I love It's a 10 products, but not this one. It didn't add any volume to my hair. In fact, it seemed like my hair was flatter than usual when I used this. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: RV Living

customer_reviews.title: and each time I was super excited to get it OUT of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for months and used it a handful of times, and each time I was super excited to get it OUT of my hair! Made my hair feel sticky, greasy, heavy and gross. I love It's a 10 so I was really disappointed by this. Fairly convinced I received a fake. I would love a refund or a legit replacement if at all possible. :/
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: My hairdresser suggested thisproduct, however when I got it ...
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser suggested thisproduct, however when I got it, I found it was heavily perfumed. Had it been odor free I would have not chucked it into the circular file. Yes, it worked, I am too sensitve to too many smells, and why layer yourself in perfumes, when you spend so much on the perfume of your own choice?
customer_reviews.author: A. Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for some great results but I'm not that impressed. I tried it as a root boost, all over spray, and both combined. I don't get near the lift that my red bottle of root lift gives me. I am however due to touch up my hair color and have a cut so maybe that would make a difference with this product. Won't be buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love to use this for special occasions
customer_reviews.text: Very volumizing I really enjoy this product I wish my hair liked products as much as I do it just gets too greasy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like that it wasn't overwhelming and that it works so very well and is softening for your hair you just need to use something else with it if you want some lift in your hair
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: Volumizes but leaves residue
customer_reviews.text: This really does add a lot of volume to my fine hair. However, it also makes it look greasy or like I’ve got a ton of product buildup even when I use a minimal amount. I always make sure to brush it through my wet hair after spraying the roots, but it leaves my hair looking a bit grimy. I do have to say, it SMELLS AMAZING. I may have to keep playing around with it to make it work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: VOLUMIZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Allows you to spray exactly where you want the volume to be which is why I use it I don't want volume in some places and I want a lot and others this makes it easy
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Smells sooooooo good
customer_reviews.text: Smell is amazing. Gives volume you need even if you don’t blow dry after. Have tried many different kinds of volume boost sprays like this and this one is my favorite and will be sticking with this one for good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, didn't volumize my hair at all.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two...duh me. This did nothing for my hair, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Volume!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. After having some issues with hair thinning/shedding, this really helps give me more volume. It doesn’t take much and one bottle lasts me about 4 months with using approximately every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair sticky
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, as I love the other products in this line. But I used it on my hair before blow drying my roots, and it just made my hair sticky and gross. It was terrible.. it made my hair stick to itself, almost like a gel. I have fine hair, so I just needed more volume. I tried it about three times before I just gave up. This did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin hair and this really helps with volume without a sticker residue!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I very much wanted this product to work on my very fine and thin hair. It sprays on very wet in my opinion. Initially my bangs seemed full after blow drying; however, they fell as they usually do after a half an hour or so. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anita D Winslow Stack

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I found this product thanks to a blogger and I'm not going back. Along with a good haircut and shampoo/conditioner, this volumizing spray works wonders. My hair is shiny and super bouncy. I plan to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Thanks to my parents I have genetically challenged hair. When I use this product my hair is fuller and bouncier. It's amazing! My mom swipped my first bottle so I have to keep it hidden when she comes to visit. Best stuff ever for fine limp hair!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Sherry

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have fine hair and it definitely has more body when I use this. I'm throwing all my other gels, etc. away and using this product only from now on.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Wife Likes It
customer_reviews.text: Got it at Wife's request and she likes it. Good price. Arrived quickly and well packaged. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: DenD

customer_reviews.title: Can doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give a zero because the can doesn’t work at all and I see it can not be returned. Have pushed the button repeatedly and nothing happens.:(
customer_reviews.author: CGleas

customer_reviews.title: This product works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A great volumizer! My stylist uses it in his shop and I decided to get some for myself to use at home.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Check return policy before buying...Item came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Can came badly detented. I went to send it back and it says no returns. I can’t even use it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! I wanted a spray volumizer, instead of mouse or gel. This product is awesome. I sprayed some in, worked it through hair, tipped my head over and used the blow dryer. WOW, my hair was so full!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Joy C.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It doesn’t weigh my hair down or make it sticky and it give and hold volume all day.
customer_reviews.author: TracyL

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome. Spray on damp hair and blow dry
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. Spray on damp hair and blow dry. The volume it gives your hair is insane. Looks great and doesn’t fall flat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More volume for my baby fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I did not like was the price, it is overpriced as far as I am concerned. The product is overpriced not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Twilly1957

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. I have very fine thin hair and its gives me the volume I need without being to heavy. And my daughter with thick short hair lives it also.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne G

customer_reviews.title: Vavavooom !!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was using this and I tried it . Works great on fine hair , lots of volume and smalls great . A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: It works and smells good!
customer_reviews.text: To portray the image that my hair is fuller than it is...
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gigi

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! I have shoulder length blond hair and this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I have shoulder length blond hair and this really is good for both volume and a final hold (if you allow it to dry). You can work with hair after it's sprayed on dry hair only after it's dry (which doesn't take long). Used on damp hair, it really does a great job holding hair if you round brush dry it. I'll be buying this again and do recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: icdeals

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting hold
customer_reviews.text: I have used the one in the pump bottle and I love that one. This spray can is very sticky and stiff
customer_reviews.author: Msplt

customer_reviews.title: Don't get if you have oily hair
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to but leaves a lot of residue in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: laura peddell

customer_reviews.title: Creates a gummy residue and volume is nothing special
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is to be used sparingly as it creates this gross gummy residue on your scalp. Also it’s a pump spray not aerosol which is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: r2

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking fly away and frizz after drying
customer_reviews.text: Be carful not to spray too much near your roots or it can feel greasy. I like that it tames my flyaway as after drying my hair, no need for hairspray. Sometimes I don't even have to flat iron my hair because this stuff can hold it straight after blow drying really well
customer_reviews.author: rose new

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it makes my hair feel.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second van really like this stuff!I like the way it makes my hair feel. My hair is naturally white.And this makes my hair less wispy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kronenberg

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume but also stickiness
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job with volume but is definitely sticky. The spray nozzle doesn’t always work right either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product is very expensive and does not provide volume. It left my hair feeling dry and dirty. I have tried two other It's a 10 products and would not recommend any of them. A waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn H Berry

customer_reviews.title: My go-to hair secret!
customer_reviews.text: I can't go without using this product! Otherwise, my hair is limp and has no volume. I spray my roots and let it sit for about 5 minutes, then blow dry using a 3" round brush. A little goes a long way. I don't wash my hair but maybe 3 times a week and one can has lasted me almost a year, I couldn't believe it. I've recommended this to all my friends and family. I recently fixed my mom's hair for an event and she couldn't believe the difference. She has short, thin hair and there was no need to curl it after! Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: lindseyah11

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this as per the instructions and ot made my hair feel like 500 year old rope. So crispy and dry. If it added any oomph I didnt notice.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does give hair a lift and a lot of volume. Only downside is it makes my hair a little straw-like until I wash it out. But it definitely gives it volume!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Volumizing Sprays Are Out There
customer_reviews.text: I’d read so many good reviews about this and I know “It’s a 10” products are excellent on the whole, but this didn’t add as much volume as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Olyve A

customer_reviews.title: Great added volume!
customer_reviews.text: I really noticed the extra volume! Like that it is not aerosolized.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Christian

customer_reviews.title: It has a wonderful smell to it also
customer_reviews.text: My hair won’t do a thing & this spray takes to task in getting my hair to stay up! It has a wonderful smell to it also. Highly recommend!! Cheaper to purchase on Amazon than in a salon too!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Taylor Jr

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and it’s hard to find in stores. Gives my fine hair a little “grip” which helps w blow drying and styling. Not greasy or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Will Cravens

customer_reviews.title: True blue
customer_reviews.text: Love it - 2 stylists have used and recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: I have thin hair and really could not see, or feel, any difference using this product. Thought I would give it a try, but didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kcronk

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair look young & healthy
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for the first time two days ago and results are just what I was looking for. Volume & bounce.
customer_reviews.author: M. Case

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine and thin hair and love the volume that this product helps me achieve. Love It
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great product....nice smell and it really does "pump" up the hair. I spray it on my hair when it's slightly damp, then I blow-dry. It makes the hair appear shinier, thicker, and more manageable. If you style your hair afterwards, the volumizer will help hold the style better.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Not all that I hoped it would be. I am using it more like a detangler than a styling agent. It really doesn't have enough "hold" to be used alone. Small can of product too. Not sure I'd buy it again given the cost of the item.
customer_reviews.author: VLD13

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever to add volume to hair. Smells great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Straub

customer_reviews.title: It's a 10
customer_reviews.text: I'm been using this product for the last year and I love it. It adds volume to my hair that it needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: They must have made it just for me!
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I have baby fine, thin, limp hair that resists all attempts to add body and curl. But I love It's a 10 blow dry volumizer! I like the way you apply it. It's a very fine spray you can apply right where you need it. And it gives my crummy hair body and curl that lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Denimgyrl

customer_reviews.title: Body for tjin, fine, straight hair.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about three years and absolutely love it. I have thin, fine and straight hair, with this product I actually have body!
customer_reviews.author: craftygrandma

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what I did before I found this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It really is a 10. Works as a finishing spray and when sprayed on roots and then blow-dry, gives roots volume and hold to hair . Little goes a long way and the product will last for months. It also washes out easily, so no product buildup.
customer_reviews.author: C. Craun

customer_reviews.title: baby fine hair up and full
customer_reviews.text: I already ordered a second one. So far one of just a few products that keep my short, baby fine hair up and full.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with high hopes. It failed. This leaves my hair so sticky that I can't get a brush through it without worrying about pulling my hair out. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Gal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this product makes my hair full. My friends can’t believe how much volume my hair when theirs is flat because it is so humid in our building.
customer_reviews.author: Percilla Felton

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: As a first time user it was different but gave my hair a lift and a great replacement for hairspray. (I have fine thin hair).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this to use-it has been recapped. There is no smell, and the top is completely different! I have been using it’s a 10 for several years-I believe this is water in a can!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Guinn

customer_reviews.title: it does put some dryness in your hair
customer_reviews.text: really love the volume it gives me and you don't need a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Not a great volumizer
customer_reviews.text: Ok but not at all my favorite. Just feels like hairspray ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my fine hair. I’ve tried lots of products, this works well without weighing down. I wash every 3-4 days and use dry shampoo in between.
customer_reviews.author: trina

customer_reviews.title: A great product for thickening your hair
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to apply and does a great job of increasing the volume of your hair
customer_reviews.author: William B. Ammann

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing on the days I flat iron my hair it helps with the frizz and humidity
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Spray apparatus broke with more than half of product still in can. Had to discard unable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L. McGuigan

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair greasy and does nothing good at all
customer_reviews.text: Makes hair greasy and does nothing good at all, I have very easy & straight hair type but this product makes it look like a nightmare! Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Nit as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Much better price than in the stores. It is ok but doesn’t add too much volume
customer_reviews.author: Devra Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I have fine natural curl hair. My hair usually looks great 5 min after blow drying & then goes limp. But now I spray about 4 sprays on my crown on damp hair. And walla now full of body hair, not stiff either. Just soft bouncy curl full of life. I have found my new best friend
customer_reviews.author: Txbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must-have product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It provides a great amount of volume. While my hair is not thin; I have a lot of it, my actual follicles are thin and this product provides volume unlike any other I have tried. It does not leave my hair sticky, weighted down or greasy, which are problems I have had with every other similar product. I have this product shipped monthly in my subscribe and save and I will continue doing this until the product goes off the shelves. It is absolutely a must-have product and I use it almost daily. Love, love, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product while visiting my sister..I liked it so much I ordered it as soon as I got home. I wear my hair short and it kept it in place, but was able to brush it Out with a heavy glue like build up!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume without weight.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I have very fine straight hair and this really helps give me volume. It is light, does not add weight or residue.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It helps your roots lift up a bit and gives more volume to your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Bright_Idea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best hair product I've ever used. Not heavy and gives great volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product hate the change
customer_reviews.text: They changed nozzles and it shoots a stream instead of a fine mist. It’s a 10 messed up by changing nozzles!! I can’t use this expensive product that I LOVED in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a 10!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for fine hair! It provides texture and volume to my baby fine hair!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Hair stays soft and shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have fine hair, but A LOT of it. It's long and straight, and this gives me the perfect amount of volume around my roots without being sticky or greasy. My hair stays soft and shiny! I'll definitely be ordering this again!
customer_reviews.author: bri9286

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair brittle
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. Difficult to style hair after application. Made hair very stiff and brittle. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Jones

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Adds volume, smells great and doesn't feel heavy in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Bagdanov

product_meta.title: It's a 10 Haircare Miracle Blowdry Volumizer, White, 6 fl. oz.
feature_bullets: Give hair a little extra lift, without the sticky, heavy hold of traditional hairspray. Our flexible, multipurpose formula conditions, controls, and adds bounce and volume without leaving any trace on finished strands.
No more trading rich conditioning, softness, and shine for limp, heavy hair.
Give strands the boost of moisture and nutrients they need with the bouncy volume and movement that everyone deserves.
Only nature’s most lightweight ingredients are chosen for this special line that features:Marshmallow Root Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Acai Extract
